about_the_game:
Survival is your only goal in Reckfell.

The world is merciless—its creatures, the environment, and even other survivors will do everything to destroy you. Every step outside your shelter could be your last. To survive, you'll need to gather resources, create tools, build defenses, and outsmart those who want to end you. Use every opportunity to last one more day in this harsh and ever-changing world.

Key Features


• Open World Exploration: Travel through a vast and hostile environment filled with hidden dangers and mysteries waiting to be discovered.

• Dynamic Weather and Day/Night Cycle: Prepare for sudden weather changes and the dangers that the world of Reckfell can present.

• Trading: There are traders on the map with whom you can trade and put your goods up for sale.

• Weapon Customization: Customize your weapons with various modifications.

• Raiding and Base Protection System: Fight and capture enemy bases.

• Bandits and Outposts: In addition to wildlife and the undead, you'll have to battle bandits and capture outposts.

• Transport: The game features many types of vehicles, and over time there will be even more, with customization options.

• Farming: You can grow your own food and raise livestock!

• Hordes of the Undead!: In Reckfell, there's a chance that a whole horde of zombies may attack your base, and you need to be prepared and defend yourself. Zombie behavior is unpredictable; they are chaotic and dangerous because of it.

• Building and Crafting: Gather resources to build and reinforce your shelter against relentless threats, build traps and mechanisms—let your imagination run wild.

• Survival Mechanics: Monitor hunger, thirst, temperature, and fatigue to stay alive!

• Combat and Stealth: Choose your approach—fight enemies head-on or use stealth to avoid them.

• Multiplayer: Survive alone or team up with other players.

• Character Customization: Create a character that reflects your playstyle.

Will You Survive?


In Reckfell, every decision matters. The world is relentless, and only the strongest will survive. Are you ready to do whatever it takes to stay alive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100 или AMD Ryzen 3 2300X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K или AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
